title: Video offers a closer look at how Apple uses its ‘Daisy’ robot to recycle iPhones
content:
Back in 2018, Apple introduced “Daisy” – a new robot capable of disassembling iPhones to recycle device parts. Now, thanks to YouTuber Sara Dietschy, we can finally get a closer look at every step Daisy takes to carefully disassemble an iPhone.

more…

The post Video offers a closer look at how Apple uses its ‘Daisy’ robot to recycle iPhones appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Thanks to YouTuber Sara Dietschy, we can finally get a closer look at every step the Daisy robot takes to disassemble iPhones.
